title: The Knowers
description: Will’s sole ambition is to get out of high school alive and away from his vicious father. His brilliant plan to fly below the radar blows up in his face when he gets involved with the mysterious Lizzy. Will worries for Lizzy’s safety, exposing her to his dangerous world, only to discover what Lizzy really is and what she fights. How can Will, a Knower, and Lizzy, a daughter from The Garden, possibly find a way to be together?
author: Merry Brown
